title: External Rode Videomic GO not working with Pixel 2 phone
content:
I have bought a Rode Videomic Go, which I was assured would work with a Google Pixel 2. I have the trs to trrs cable etc, but no video application will record sound. I sometimes get a hiss, but that's it. It's driving me nuts. Does anyone have any idea where I might be going wrong?

Thanks
